title: VA Rep. Riggleman, Voting Misinformation
itunes:title: VA Rep. Riggleman, Voting Misinformation
description:
Kevin was joined by Bloomberg's Carol Massar and June Grasso for special coverage of Election 2020. Guests: Mattie Duppler, Founder of Forward Strategies, and Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union , Fred Hochberg, Former Chairman and President of Export-Import Bank and Congressman Denver Riggleman, a Republican representing Virginia's 5th district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
